name: food irradiator
description: This is a portable version of the food irradiator, used to sterilize fruits and vegetables.  It has a set of plutonium rods emitting a steady stream of ionizing radiation, and requires no additional power source.

name: Irradiator Instruction Manual
description: A small instruction manual for working the Rivtech Atomic Autoclave.  You could use this to figure out how to irradiate vegetables.
